author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
A tag already exists, but it points at the wrong commit
```
To retry, comment on this PR with the phrase `TagBot tag`.
cc: @christopher-dG
<!-- 1a78ab00-d39e-11e9-9270-9c7bb51df99f -->

Maybe I should have checked more carefully before merging, but why is this a separate package from `TensorDecompositions`? It is just one function, and includes very strange things like
https://github.com/TensorDecompositions/LoadTensorDecompositions.jl/blob/8f4034e03fa94f60896e3279b07df1c95132707f/src/LoadTensorDecompositions.jl#L9-L11

title: New package: LoadTensorDecompositions v0.1.0
